author: eric-jesover
body:
version 6.0.0.9
## Steps to reproduce

start-job -Name "Testing" -ScriptBlock {get-process}
receive-job -id xxx
## Expected behavior

le process list
## Actual behavior

[localhost] The background process reported an error with the following message: -Version : The term '-Version' is not
recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. .
- CategoryInfo : OpenError: (localhost:String) [], PSRemotingTransportException
- FullyQualifiedErrorId : 2100,PSSessionStateBroken

this working correctly on 5.1.14393.0 on windows 10
## Environment data

windows 10

Name                           Value

---

WSManStackVersion              3.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.9
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
CLRVersion
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSEdition                      Core
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0

comments.author: kort3x
comments.body:
This is a well known issue: The background job cmdlets are available and work with the important exception of Start-Job.
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/KNOWNISSUES.md

title: start-job failing
